titles.title: A bill to increase the number of Deputy United States Marshals that investigate immigration crimes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1528)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
2/1/2007--Introduced.
Directs the Attorney General, subject to the availability of appropriations, to increase by at least 50 for each of FY2008-FY2012 the number of full-time Deputy U.S. Marshals that investigate criminal immigration matters. Authorizes appropriations.
